*$py.class
*.so

downloads/

venv/
env/
ENV/
.venv

# IDE
.vscode/
.idea/
*.swp
*.swo
*~
.DS_Store

# Jupyter Notebook
.ipynb_checkpoints
# Allow .ipynb files (include notebooks)

# Data files (large files - don't commit)
data/
*.tsv
*.csv
*.pkl
*.pickle
*.h5
*.hdf5

# Model files (large - don't commit)
*.pkl
*.model
*.joblib

# Results and outputs (generated files)
custom_topic_results/
classification_analytics/
demo_results/
reports/
plots/
*.png
*.jpg
*.jpeg
# Allow PDF files (include project report)
# *.pdf

# Logs
*.log
logs/

# Environment variables
.env
.env.local

# OS
Thumbs.db
.DS_Store

# Temporary files
*.tmp
*.temp
*.bak

# Exclude documentation guides
GITHUB_SETUP.md
PRESENTATION_GUIDE.md

# Exclude archive and document files
*.zip
*.docx
noimages_OB_YB_AB_YB.pdf
writeup_OB_YB_AB_YB.pdf
